shortDescription: By attacking and securing the refinery. We will divert resources to our Employer, and make it more difficult for our opponent to wage war.
longDescription: Mining and Drilling are a large part of ware efforts, By switching these resources we will tip the scale of the fight.

contractObjectiveList.title: Take advantage of this planets sensor interference to approach enemy units unseen
Eliminate Enemy 'Mechs to secure resource storage silos
Act quickly to prevent the Enemy from sabotaging the silos

objectiveList.title: TAKE CONTROL OF AT LEAST ONE STORAGE SILO
DESTROY FORCES AT SILO ALPHA BEFORE IT SELF DESTRUCTS
DESTROY FORCES AT SILO ALPHA BEFORE IT SELF DESTRUCTS
Destroy the units Defending Silo Bravo
DESTROY FORCES AT SILO BRAVO BEFORE IT SELF DESTRUCTS
Destroy the units Defending Silo Charlie
DESTROY FORCES AT SILO CHARLIE BEFORE IT SELF DESTRUCTS

dialogueContent.words: Capturing more than one silo will help turn the tide for our employer, Though even one will help..
Instraments are next to useless with this much interference, you will have to rely on you own eye sight and being close and personal with the enemies to get locks.
We should be next to invisible on approach, Commander. Try and use this to our advantage.
With the resources secure we are done here. Time to get paid.
Recovery teams moving in Commander.
Don't get to close, If you can see them clearly, most likely they can see you.
Lock and load, We've got company!
Silo Bravo has detected you. Be prepaired for trouble.
Alpha Lance, I've got eyes on the enemy!
Silo Alpha has detected your presence, if you give them enough time, they'll set the silo to self-destruct.
Weapons hot, Charlie Lance! We've got incoming BattleMechs at my position!
Silo Charlie is under alert. Take it quickly, before they have time to destroy it.
They have nearly finished wiring the silo to blow!
Consider this silo lost.
Commander, I'm detecting Directorate reinforcements between you and the evac point. You may have a fight on your hands.
They've almost finished rigging that silo to blow.
Were out of time, Try and get clear quickly.
That silo is almost ready to blow!
We have boots on the ground, lets get those explosives difused
We've set down combat engineers, they're securing the structure.
Explosive defusal is a go, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}.
Good work, Commander our employer will be happy.
We need to get these 'Mechs hosed down and decontaminated. C'mon, Commander… Yang's got a great big tub of boron, and he's just dying to use it.
Commander, the area has been cleared. Darius has given me the green light to land immediately. Hold position.
Welcome to the badlands, Commander. The sands of this desert are rich in exotic elements that play havoc with electronic sensors and communications.

The badlands are a gold mine of rare-earth metals and fissile materials. The enemy has seized control of our employers largest processor and refinery, and they're getting ready to move a year's supply of exotic materials offworld.
We need to capture at least one of those silos for the Restoration.
The radiation is interfering with enemy long-range communications.
If we can pick off one at a time, we should have an easier time of things.
Good work, Commander. The target has suffered a major setback, and our employer has gained a valuable new asset.
We need to get these 'Mechs hosed down and decontaminated.
